sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Incidental, out of turn) When activating Time to Go, the character may allow one ally he is engaged with to perform an out of turn Move maneuver as an incidental. This maneuver may only be used to move into cover or out of the blast radius of an explosion. This incidental occurs after the ally determines he would be hit by the blast, but before damage is applied.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Time to Go (Improved)</name> <number>TAL0001263</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-05 22:56:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3dffefe52f18a850e0f497eef699b6b2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-05 22:56:28</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
